item.title: TOFFS Technologies, Software Engineer
item.description: TOFFS provides Multi-CDN and cybersecurity solutions for Enterprise networking needs. Developed a backend application to integrate an Anti-DDoS machine learning solution to TOFFS’ infra to provide real-time DDoS protection to TOFFS’ customers Used concurrent programming to process large amounts of data (>2.5TB) to train more than 10k DDoS-Detection machine learning (ML) models tailored to eligible customer domains Optimised model training efficiency (achieved up to 50% reduction in training time) Tech Stack ðŸ“š : Golang, Python, MySQL, Graylogs, REST APIs, Docker, Linux, Git
